DOC.brief_summary: This two arms parallel cluster-randomized trial will evaluate the impact of monitoring surgical outcomes using Shewhart control chart (intervention) on the occurence of major adverse events, among a large sample of French surgical departments. Trends in surgical outcomes before and after the intervention will be compared between arms.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Control Chart Impact on Surgical Outcomes
DOC.criteria: All adults needing a digestive surgery who are hospitalized in one of the 40 departments Age < 18 years old Hospitalization <24 hours Absence of surgical procedure Ambulatory care Palliative care Organ transplantation
